name: Hair Golem
languages: Understands the languages of its creator but can't speak
resist: bludgeoning, piercing from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine
conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

trait.name: Immutable Form
text: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

action.name: Lash
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.
